title: Cart gets cleared automatically on Android devices (version 2.2.0)
technical_details: The issue seems to be related to the app's session management or cart functionality. It's possible that the app is not properly storing or retrieving the cart contents, leading to it being cleared automatically. Further investigation is needed to determine the root cause of the issue. The fact that the user has given a low rating suggests that this issue has a significant impact on their experience with the app. Therefore, it's essential to address this issue as soon as possible to prevent further user dissatisfaction and potential loss of users. The app's version is 2.2.0, which may indicate that the issue is related to a recent update or change. The platform is Google Play, which means that the issue is specific to Android devices. To reproduce the issue, we would need to follow these steps: 1. Open the app on an Android device. 2. Add items to the cart. 3. Close the app or switch to a different screen. 4. Reopen the app or return to the cart screen. 5. Observe that the cart has been cleared automatically. title: Cart Automatically Clears on iOS Devices
technical_details: The cart is cleared automatically, causing users to lose their selected items. This issue is likely related to a bug in the app's session management or a misconfigured API call. Further investigation is needed to determine the root cause. The issue is reported on iOS devices running version 2.1.3 of the app, and the user has given a low rating of 2, indicating a significant impact on their experience. Due to the high user impact and potential revenue loss, this issue should be prioritized as High. The steps to reproduce are not explicitly provided, but based on the context, it can be inferred that the issue occurs when a user adds items to their cart and then navigates away or closes the app, only to find the cart empty upon returning. A concise bug title for this issue could be 'Cart Automatically Clears on iOS Devices'.

title: Praise: SE001
description:
Subject: Good Experience
Body: Just wanted to say Shoppy is great. The delivery was fast and the UI is smooth.

title: App Crashes on Payment Processing
description:
Subject: Refund Delay
Body: I am using Shoppy on a Samsung Galaxy S22 running Android 14. The app crashes when I proceed to payment. Steps to reproduce: add item to cart, checkout.

title: Praise: SE003
description:
Subject: Suggestion for Improvement
Body: Just wanted to say Shoppy is great. The delivery was fast and the UI is smooth.

title: As a Shoppy user, I want to be able to add products to a wishlist so that I can save items for future purchases and improve my shopping experience
description:
Subject: General Feedback
Body: Hi, I would like to suggest adding a wishlist feature in Shoppy. It would improve the shopping experience a lot.
technical_details: Implementing a wishlist feature would require changes to the database schema to store wishlist items, updates to the product page to include an 'Add to Wishlist' button, and the creation of a new wishlist page where users can view and manage their saved items. Additionally, ensuring a seamless user experience across different devices and browsers is crucial.
